titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for removing of horses above the value forth of the shyre, of Lanerk, of Renfrew
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Committee of the West.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Saunders, Printer to the City and University, by warrant of the Committy of Council,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under our Signet at Glasgow, the twenty seven day, of March, 1678, and of our Reigne, the threttie year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: warrant of the Committy of Council
